name: Creatures Match-3
description:
Creatures is an strategic match 3 puzzle game, to play move the creatures to connect 3 or more of the same type.

Features:
- Challenging Match 3 gameplay
- Cool Graphics
- Great Music and Sound Effects
- Lots of Levels to complete
- Collect magic runes to make combos
- 3 Difficulty settings
- Play Fullscreen or Windowed
- Close any time and resume later

More info at www.boviosoft.com
